product_name: BOB Duallie Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Graco Seats
long_description: The BOB Duallie Infant car seat adapter lets you conveniently take your infant from the car to your BOB Duallie stroller without having to remove your babe from your Graco car seat.
short_description: The BOB Duallie Infant car seat adapter lets you conveniently take your infant from the car to your BOB Duallie stroller without having to remove your babe from your Graco car seat.
